Package il.co.hac.edu.yekhezkelyo.ex1

  • Interface Summary
    Interface Description
    Initializer
    This interface defines a registrar, which is an object that is responsible for registering all of the required implementations in a factory for a given build (based on the Command design pattern).
    LanguageCheck
    Defines a language checking type.
    LanguageCheckFactory.GenerateLanguageCheck
    A command for generating a LanguageCheck implementation.
    OpCodes
    This is an enumeration of the different op-codes.
    Registrar<T>
    This interface defines (and implements) a type that performs auto-registration of classes at factories.
    UrlCheck
    Defines an object that checks a URL for something (determined by the implementation).
    UrlCheckFactory.GenerateUrlCheck
    Defines a command that creates and returns a UrlCheck implementation.
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    App
    This class's sole responsibility is to execute the run method of Controller and give it everything it needs.
    ArgsParser
    This class is responsible for the parsing and validation of the commands received from the user.
    Controller
    The controller is responsible for the execution flow of the program and I/O.
    EnglishCheckByLetterFreq
    Checks if an HTML page in a given address is in English, based on letter frequencies.
    LanguageCheckFactory
    Factory for LanguageCheck implementations.
    Main
    Class for main function - entry point.
    UrlCheckFactory
    A factory class for UrlCheck implementations.
    UrlCheckI
    Checks a URL for the presence of img tags.
    UrlCheckL
    Checks if a URL is in the requested language.
    UrlCheckT
    Check if a URL's content type header starts with a given string.
    UrlCheckW
    Given a path to a file with words in it (separated by spaces and new lines) this class's instance will check if the given URL contains all of the words in the file.
  • Exception Summary
    Exception Description
    InvalidCommandException
    Defines an exception to be thrown when an invalid command is entered.
